answers.answer: Can they both get married?--Yes.If she gets vaccinated, is it ok?--The more important thing to get is HBsAB+.I read in an article that even if the sex partner is vaccinated, hepatitis B carrier should be careful that there is no blood leaks from him. is it true?--Not true if the partner has HBsAB+.

some get infection although very mild and very short dispite vaccine, this is no worry but since diabetes is the higest risk for liver cancer and liver fibrosis make sure to reach a very high titer of hbsab so that the virus cannot make any illness even very mild, make many shots since a high titer of hbsab is developpeda protective titer is 10miu/ml, a good titer is above 200miu/ml, a very high titer is above 500-1000miu/ml

question: Hi,My friend is diabetic for 4 years. She is going to marry a person who is living with Hepatits B.Can they both get married? If she gets vaccinated, is it ok? I read in an article that even if the sex partner is vaccinated, hepatitis B carrier should be careful that there is no blood leaks from him. is it true? She is tensed. Please advise.Thanks,June.
title: Can a Diabetic marry a Hepatitis B carrier?
